title: FILE – Electronic Language International Festival 2026
content:
From August 18 to October 11, 2026; submissions due February 19. 
FILE – Electronic Language International Festival is now accepting project submissions and invites artists, researchers, creators, and developers to participate in its next edition. An international reference in the fields of art, technology, and innovation, FILE will take place in … Continue reading →
creator: Susanna Capannini

title: Develop new skills and build capacity for 3D in 2026 with EUreka3D-XR
content:
New blogpost on Europeana Pro by EUreka3D project 
Discover the many upcoming events and exciting initiatives organized in the context of EUreka3D-XR project, as the project enters its final year: EUreka3D-XR at Public Domain Day in Europe 2026 (15 January) 3D-4CH Winter School (21 – 23 January) EUreka3D-XR … Continue reading →
